name: Ghost Mood
description:
Ghost Mood is a little experiment with the Bitsy Game Maker that I made in about 6 hours! Play as a ghost from a small town's graveyard and experience the area. Just a little experience, no defined ending or anything. I hope you enjoy! 

Use arrowkeys to move, bump into people/cats to talk to them. Some people (especially cats) have more than one thing to say, so make sure to keep talking to them!
